segments.advisor_message: So, just to confirm, who is the owner of the policy? I want to make sure we have that right before we proceed.
segments.client_message: Uh, I think it’s m-me, but I, um, just realized I might’ve, like mentioned before, it should be my, uh, spouse actually. I kinda thought it was me, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! I'll update that. And what type of policy are we looking at again? Just to double-check.
segments.client_message: Yeah, m-my bad! It’s actually a Life Assurance, but, um, I might’ve said Income Protection earlier. Ugh, I’m not sure why I mixed that up.
